name: Radish (itch) (Stickguy)
description:
Submitted as a part of VGDC game jam, this was made in 20 hours for the theme "Find the Traitor." There is a lousy radish in the patch. Find the traitor among the bad ones! 

This game was made by Adam Kaci, Emily Krohn, Jonathan Story, Joann Sum, and Stephanie Becerra.
